column1: Local Foods////SO good!! Went for the first time today because of a friends recommendation and it was fantastic. You could tell all the food used fresh ingredients and on the healthier side. I got the truffled egg salad sandwich with sides of kale and tabbouli. The sides were pretty good but not amazing. However
column2: the egg salad sandwich was incredible! It was so tasty and I'm not even the biggest fan of egg salad.
